{"id":1418107505,"question_id":50,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1728570420,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1418107505/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution{\npublic:\n    double solve(double x, long n){\n\n        if(n<0){\n            return solve(1/x,-n);\n        }\n        if(n==0){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        if(n%2 == 0){                  \n            return solve(x*x,n/2);     \n        }\n        else{                       \n            return x*solve(x*x,n/2);\n        }\n    }\n\n    double myPow(double x, int n){\n        double ans = solve(x, long(n));\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
